#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

string add(string s1,string s2)
{
	int sum=0,carry=0;
	string ret="";
	for(int i=s1.size()-1;i>=0;i--)
	{
		int n = (s1[i]-'0')+(s2[i]-'0')+carry;
		sum=n%10;
		carry=n/10;
		char ch=(sum+'0');
		ret=ch+ret;
		//cout<<n<<" "<<ret<<"\n";
	}
	while(carry!=0){
		char ch = ((carry%10)+'0');
		ret=ch+ret;
		carry/=10;
	}
	//cout<<"ret="<<ret<<endl;
	return ret;
}
string trim(string s)
{
	int i=0;
	for(i=0;i<s.size();i++)
		if(s[i]!='0')
			break;
	//cout<<"i="<<i<<endl;
	//if(i==0)
		return s.substr(i);
	return s.substr(i-1);
}
		
string sub(string s1)
{	
	s1=trim(s1);
	int borrow=1;
	for(int i=s1.size()-1;borrow||i>=0;i--)
	{
		if(s1[i]=='0'){
			s1[i]='9';
			borrow=1;
		}
		else
		{
			s1[i]=s1[i]--;
			borrow=0;
			break;
		}
		//cout<<s1<<endl;
	}
	s1=trim(s1);
	return s1;
}

int main()
{
	string s;
	while(cin>>s){
		if(s=="0"){
			cout<<"0"<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		if(s=="1"){
			cout<<"1"<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		s=add(s,s);
		s=sub(s);
		s=sub(s);
		cout<<s<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
